about_the_game:
When you bear the armor of the Order of the Deep, you represent this mighty guild as generations of graybeards have done before you. Let your pickaxe pierce with the Order's might, and claim the depths -- for Rock and Stone.

This DLC includes the following:

  • The 'Order of the Deep' Armor Framework for all four classes
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Armor Paintjob for all other armor sets
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Weapon Paintjob
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Pickaxe Paintjob
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Bosco Framework (with/without helmet)
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Bosco Paintjob

NOTE: This DLC is cosmetic only. It won't make you better at the game in any way. But it sure will make you look cool.

content_descriptors.notes: Violence, Use of Alcohol, Strong Language

detailed_description:
When you bear the armor of the Order of the Deep, you represent this mighty guild as generations of graybeards have done before you. Let your pickaxe pierce with the Order's might, and claim the depths -- for Rock and Stone.

This DLC includes the following:

  • The 'Order of the Deep' Armor Framework for all four classes
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Armor Paintjob for all other armor sets
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Weapon Paintjob
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Pickaxe Paintjob
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Bosco Framework (with/without helmet)

NOTE: This DLC is cosmetic only. It won't make you better at the game in any way. But it sure will make you look cool.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 /w 1GB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core

short_description: The Order of the Deep DLC grants you the armor of this venerated dwarven mining guild. It's your turn to represent the Order, plunging ever further into the perilous depths.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Turkish, Spanish - Latin America, Hungarian, Romanian
*languages with full audio support
